+00000f90: 6c73 2a2a 0a0a 2a20 5468 6520 6070 6c6f  ls**..* The `plo

+00000ff0: 2060 6964 7360 2061 7267 756d 656e 7420   `ids` argument

+00001090: 745f 7369 6d69 6c61 725f 696d 6773 6020  t_similar_imgs`

+00001130: 2c20 7468 6520 7061 7468 2074 6f20 7468  , the path to th
